com.stormpath.sdk.oauth

Interface IdSiteAuthenticationRequestBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Oauth2AuthenticationRequestBuilder<IdSiteAuthenticationRequest>

    public interface IdSiteAuthenticationRequestBuilder
extends Oauth2AuthenticationRequestBuilder<IdSiteAuthenticationRequest>
    Builder that can construct IdSiteAuthenticationRequest instances.
    Since:
    1.0.RC8.2

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IdSiteAuthenticationRequest build()
      Builds a new RefreshGrantRequest instance based on the current builder state.
      IdSiteAuthenticationRequestBuilder setToken(String token)
      Specifies the Id Site token that will be used to obtain an Access Token.

    • Method Detail

      • setToken

        IdSiteAuthenticationRequestBuilder setToken(String token)
        Specifies the Id Site token that will be used to obtain an Access Token.
        Parameters:
        token - the token that will be used to obtain an Access Token.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.

      • build

        IdSiteAuthenticationRequest build()
        Builds a new RefreshGrantRequest instance based on the current builder state.
        Specified by:
        build in interface Oauth2AuthenticationRequestBuilder<IdSiteAuthenticationRequest>
        Returns:
        the RefreshGrantRequest object used to create a new authentication token
